original_text: God always does what he says he will do. In the same way, my promise to you was not both ‘Yes’ and ‘No’.
korean_text: 하나님은 미쁘시니라 우리가 너희에게 한 말은 예 하고 아니라 함이 없노라

sentences.original_text: God always does what he says he will do.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 항상 자신이 하겠다고 말씀하신 것을 행하십니다.
